title: 84/7/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 December 1983 amending Decision 83/122/EEC granting financial assistance within the framework of the special energy development programme (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 December 1983
amending Decision 83/122/EEC granting financial assistance within the framework of the special energy development programme
(Only the German text is authentic)
(84/7/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 83/122/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 1, '210 million ECU' is replaced by '272 484 600 ECU'.
2. The table annexed to the aforesaid Decision is replaced by the table annexed hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 December 1983.
For the Commission
Étienne DAVIGNON
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 73, 19. 3. 1983, p. 8.
(2) OJ No L 82, 29. 3. 1983, p. 23.
